dcterms:creator: Jamie Shotton
Ben Glocker
Christopher Zach
Shahram Izadi
Antonio Criminisi
Andrew Fitzgibbon
dcterms:description: An RGB-D dataset of seven small-scale indoor environments ranging in size from 1m3 to 18m3. This dataset features challenges such as repeating structures, motion blur, and texture-less areas. Each scene consists of several thousand RGB images recorded by KinectFusion, which also provides the ground truth for camera poses.
dcterms:title: 7-Scenes

dcterms:creator: Tien Do
Ondrej Miksik
Joseph DeGol
Hyun Soo Park
Sudipta N Sinha
dcterms:description: A non-stationary dataset consisting of images captured in much larger environments at different times and days, exhibiting strong illumination variations. It contains six different indoor environments, each with multiple rooms.
dcterms:title: Indoor6

dcterms:creator: Alex Kendall
Matthew Grimes
Roberto Cipolla
dcterms:description: An RGB outdoor dataset scaling from 875m2 to 5600m2. Each scene contains 200â€“1500 training and validation samples, which are split by the authors. The ground truth of camera poses is obtained through SfM reconstruction.
dcterms:title: Cambridge Landmarks

dcterms:description: A novel outdoor RGB dataset for evaluating the generalization capabilities of visual localization methods. It includes training trajectories that are distinct from those used for testing, collected at different times of day and night.
dcterms:title: Ritsumeikan BKC
